p: Lemongrass EO, with its high amount of both citral isomers, appeared to be another promising antifungal phytocomplex. This EO in fact is composed by a mixture of cis and trans-isomers of 3,7-dimethyl-2,6-octadiene-1-al (geranial and neral) with a percentage ranging between 38.4% and 35.2%, respectively.
